scripts.install-host-deps: cd host && cd homepage && npm install
scripts.install-searchbar-deps: cd remotes && cd searchbar && npm install
scripts.install-productlist-deps: cd remotes && cd productlist && npm install
scripts.install-cart-deps: cd remotes && cd cart && npm install
scripts.searchbar: cd remotes && cd searchbar && npm start
scripts.productlist: cd remotes && cd productlist && npm start
scripts.cart: cd remotes && cd cart && npm start
scripts.homepage: cd host && cd homepage && npm start
scripts.remotes: concurrently "npm run searchbar" "npm run productlist" "npm run cart"
